Comments: It really helped with racing thoughts and suicidal depression. I take 50mg. 2 times daily.Studies are being done for OCD_ TRD (treatment resistant depression)_ and bi-polar.  There are probably more. Rilutek (Riluzole - generic_ pro. rye-lu-zole).  It is listed for ALS (always fatal progressive paralysis)to prolong the time patients can live without a trachiotomy. I believe it is still off presciption for psychiatric purpose. Look up some studies to help you convince your therapist to try it.
